iser::ISerializable Class Reference
Persistence concept. | Main concepts and implementations

Common class for all classes which objects can be archived or restored from archive. More...

Detailed Description

Common class for all classes which objects can be archived or restored from archive.

I_DWORD iser::ISerializable::GetMinimalVersion ( int  versionId) const [inline, virtual]

Get minimal needed version to correct storing of this data.

In implementation shold be calculated maximum version of this and composed component.
